name: Improve Data Ingestion Speed
description: Customers report slow ingestion times when uploading large datasets.

name: Add Support for CSV Files
description: Clarity needs to support CSV file formats for easier data uploads.

name: Bug: Incorrect Data Mapping
description: Data mapping errors occur with specific customer datasets.

name: Enhance Dashboard UI
description: Users find the dashboard cluttered and difficult to navigate.

name: Implement Real-Time Analytics
description: Real-time data processing for immediate insights.

name: Bug: Login Issues
description: Users experience login failures intermittently.

name: Add Data Visualization Options
description: More visualization options needed for better insights representation.

name: Bug: Incorrect Time Zone Display
description: Data timestamps are shown in the wrong time zones.

name: Add Multilingual Support
description: Support for multiple languages to cater to a global audience.

name: Bug: Data Sync Issues
description: Synchronization problems with third-party integrations.

name: Integrate with Slack
description: Slack integration for notifications and updates.

name: Improve Mobile Accessibility
description: Enhance mobile version for better usability.

name: CSV Support
description: Clarity needs to support CSV for easier data uploads.

name: Add Data Anomaly Detection
description: Automated detection of anomalies in data sets.

name: Bug: User Profile Saving Error
description: Changes to user profiles are not saved correctly.

name: Add Customizable Alerts
description: Users need the ability to set custom alerts for specific events.

name: Enhance Data Security
description: Stronger security measures for data protection.

name: Bug: Chart Display Issues
description: Charts not displaying correctly on certain devices.

name: Add Automated Reporting
description: Automated report generation for periodic insights.

name: Bug: Notification Delays
description: Notifications are delayed, causing user frustration.

name: Improve API Documentation
description: API documentation needs more examples and better structure.

name: Bug: Data Import Errors
description: Errors when importing certain types of data.

name: Add Predictive Analysis
description: Predictive analysis for future trends based on current data.

name: Bug: User Permission Issues
description: Users experiencing problems with assigned permissions.

name: Add Multi-Tenant Support
description: Support for multi-tenant architecture for large organizations.

name: Support .csv files
description: Clarity needs to support .csv files when uploading data.

name: Improve Data Filtering
description: Advanced filtering options for better data management.

name: Add Audit Trail
description: Audit trail for tracking changes and data access.

name: Bug: Data Export Formatting
description: Exported data format is incorrect for certain files.

name: Add Single Sign-On
description: Single sign-on support for enterprise users.

name: Bug: Missing Data Points
description: Some data points are missing in the analysis reports.

name: Improve User Training Materials
description: Better training materials and tutorials for new users.

name: SSO support
description: Support SSO for enterprise users.

name: Add Custom Fields
description: Ability for users to add custom fields to their data.

name: Bug: Session Timeout
description: Sessions are timing out too quickly, causing interruptions.

name: Add Advanced Search
description: Advanced search capabilities for more precise data queries.

name: Bug: Data Corruption
description: Some datasets are being corrupted during processing.

name: Improve Data Import Speed
description: Faster data import times for large datasets.

name: Bug: Dashboard Freezing
description: The dashboard freezes under heavy data loads.

name: Add Role-Based Access Control
description: Different access levels for different user roles.

name: Bug: Data Merge Conflicts
description: Conflicts occur when merging datasets from different sources.

name: Add Multi-Channel Support
description: Support for data from multiple communication channels.

name: Bug: Data Duplication
description: Duplicate data entries appearing in the system.

name: Improve User Feedback Loop
description: Better mechanisms for collecting and acting on user feedback.

name: Bug: Data Import Validation
description: Data validation errors during import process.

name: Add AI-Powered Insights
description: AI-generated insights from customer interaction data.

name: Bug: UI Glitches
description: Minor UI glitches affecting user experience.

name: Improve Onboarding Process
description: Smoother onboarding process for new users.
